name: Hazy Maze
summary:
The story of a sleepwalking girl in the world of dreams 
 
How do you get out of a maze? The story of a sleepwalker in the world of dreams. Move the hidden keys through the moving and falling roads and open the door. Get out from labyrinth and wake her. 
 
Jump through episodes with excitement in this game of different adventures. 
 
High quality and three-dimensional gaming experience awaits you. 
 
In this maze there will be platforms and moving platforms. You must get the key to get to the door. Complete all the sections without getting stuck. Go to the end in the mysterious maze, passing through challenging chapters.
